divs: sighting details3:00 am large dark retangular or boomerang shaped silent craft flew briskly in a south southeastern direction over kansas city, ks. it had about 7 dimmly lit orange\red lights on the bottom, approximately 10,000 to 30,000 feet in altitude and moving 300-1000 knots south southeast. size is estimated at from the ground twice as big as the pleides(?) constellation or three times the size of a stealth b2 bomber. as it coasted briskly southward it seemed to either speed up suddenly, or perhaps my eyes were not able to follow it because of the moonlight and city light pollution, but it was undeniably there when first sighted, a magnificent thing to behold especially since all my other sightings were of the star-like variety, fast movers and stoppers quickly changing direction, it was my first actual adult aged sighting which i could tell what it really looked like. thanks to creator source for the revelation of what the technological secretkeepers are doing.
Summary: dark silent rectangular with several dim orange/red lights on bottom
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around October 23rd 2007
